snippet: Nearly a month after President Obama announced his support for same-sex marriage, he got a rousing reception and at least $2.5 million at a gala of gay supporters and a private, celebrity-studded dinner afterward.
abstract: Nearly a month after President Obama announced his support for same-sex marriage, he got a rousing reception and at least $2.5 million at a gala of gay supporters and a private, celebrity-studded dinner afterward.

headline.main: Celebratory Air at Obama Event for Gay Rights Supporters
